title.narrative: Building the capacity of the cooperative as the industry leader of organic farm inputs in the Island of Luzon

description.narrative:
Kapatagan was a people’s organization founded in the year 1984.They were serviced by Payoga a non-Government Organization who introduces organic farming to the members of Kapatagan. On 2013 Payoga (NGO) and Kapatagan (the Cooperative) merge to be known as the Payoga Kapatagan MPC. Its membership coverage is province-wide i.e. Isabela Province. The total number of regular members is 3 608 of whom 2 008 were women. There are 2 001 associate members of the cooperative (of which 1 200 are women). The latest total membership of the cooperative is 5 609. A minimum of 2 shares at P250/share is required to be a regular member. The cooperative manages a Bio Organic Fertilizer (BOF) plant that was established in 1985) In 2001 the cooperative re-introduce the Bio-Organic Fertilizer to its members starting with only 30 members including the board as users. Then after few years total number of users reached to 1 000 plus. Now about 50% of the members are into organic farming business and they are using the BOF on their farms. The cooperative has their own registered label for Bio Organic Fertilizers called “Greenfriend” with the Organic Certification Center of the Philippines (OCCP). Producing 250 000 to 350 000 bags per year (starting with 5 000 bags in 1985) Target to increase to 400 000 to 6 00 000 bags Number of workers 15 regular 60 contractual (usually January to March) Current market = 50 000 individual farms in 5 regions 28 dealers in Region 1 2 3 CAR mostly farmers associations
Goal: The cooperative ambition is to have different kinds of organic fertilizer applicable to particular crops such as rice corn sugar cane and vegetable in different packages /volumes. For now they have only one brand of fertilizer i.e. Greenfriend Organic fertilizer. They target to increase production to 600 000 bags per year. They are expecting that membership will increase by 10 000 in year 2021.
